title: Cybersecurity firm Sophos impersonated by new SophosEncrypt ransomware
description: Cybersecurity vendor Sophos is being impersonated by a new ransomware-as-a-service called SophosEncrypt, with the threat actors using the company name for their operation. [...]

title: Citrix ADC and Gateway zero-day actively exploited in attacks
description: Citrix today is alerting customers of a critical-severity vulnerability (CVE-2023-3519) in NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway that already has exploits in the wild, and "strongly urges" to install updated versions without delay. [...]

title: New critical Citrix ADC and Gateway flaw exploited as zero-day
description: Citrix today is alerting customers of a critical-severity vulnerability (CVE-2023-3519) in NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway that already has exploits in the wild, and "strongly urges" to install updated versions without delay. [...]

title: New critical Citrix ADC and Gateway flaw exploited as zero-days
description: Citrix today is alerting customers of a critical-severity vulnerability (CVE-2023-3519) in NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway that already has exploits in the wild, and "strongly urges" to install updated versions without delay. [...]

title: Strengthening Password Security may Lower Cyber Insurance Premiums
description: When insurers assess an organization's cybersecurity posture, password security is a key element considered. Learn more from Specops Software on how password security can affect your insurance premiums. [...]

title: FIN8 deploys ALPHV ransomware using Sardonic malware variant
description: A financially motivated cybercrime gang has been observed deploying BlackCat ransomware payloads on networks backdoored using a revamped Sardonic malware version. [...]

title: Google Cloud Build bug lets hackers launch supply chain attacks
description: A critical design flaw in the Google Cloud Build service discovered by cloud security firm Orca Security can let attackers escalate privileges, providing them with almost nearly-full and unauthorized access to Google Artifact Registry code repositories. [...]

title: Microsoft Exchange Online hit by new outage blocking emails
description: Microsoft is investigating an ongoing Exchange Online outage preventing customers from sending emails and triggering 503 errors on affected systems. [...]

title: CISA orders govt agencies to mitigate Windows and Office zero-days
description: CISA ordered federal agencies to mitigate remote code execution zero-days affecting Windows and Office products that were exploited by the Russian-based RomCom cybercriminal group in NATO phishing attacks. [...]
